video_prompt: A pale figure's flowing garment trails dramatically as they stride. Their exaggerated eyes shift, and a subtle facial twitch reveals inner turmoil. A small, leashed creature at their feet scurries in sync. The background subtly pulsates and darkens as they move, enhancing the melancholic atmosphere.
image_prompt: Full-body, melancholic gothic cartoon illustration of a pale, black-bobbed figure with large orange eyes and dark circles, wearing an off-white collared jacket and black tie, dark shorts, and black heels. They hold a leash attached to a small, dark, rabbit-like creature with tall ears and white eyes, sitting on an inverted white cone. A long fabric trails behind the figure; the background is muted, light beige with a dark wash top-center and faint halo. Signature "Noii To°" in bottom right.
refined_video_prompt: Dramatic fabric trailing and flowing accompanies a striding motion. Exaggerated eye shifts and a subtle facial twitch convey inner turmoil. Synchronized scurrying movements follow at foot level. The background subtly pulsates and darkens with the progression.
